column5: URJ has a great intro to judaism course that you can receive scholarships for if you're wanting to connect with others who are also engaged in getting connected with Judaism. They'll reach out to local synagogues and help you get connected.

My partner is struggling with their body image and I don't know how to best support them while taking care of myself. I've tried to rationalize their feelings with them and be supportive but it's almost every day now and it's super triggering for me. He definitely has developed body dysmorphia, sometimes I wonder if it's bc of me that he has this at all.
